CustomField.description:
Enter values that must be return by the report in order to clear it. Example to allow administrator changes by John Smit on transaction 12345 or 12346 use:
John Smit,INV03091448|INV03091448
For changes by John Smit and Mark Smit on certain transactions use:
John Smit,INV03091448;Mark Smit,INV03091448
For any change by John Smit use:
John Smit
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter values that must be return by the report in order to clear it. (see field description for samples)
CustomField.label: Results Filter
